CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Requires_Technical_Review__c , 'Yes'), 'Engingeering to analyze Tech Review Comments and remove Tech Review Flag',If(OR( Regular_Unit_Price_Each__c >8000000, Regular_Unit_Price_Each__c=0), 'Engineering to Review Unit Price', If(ISPICKVAL(Engineering_Status__c, 'Requires Approval'), 'Engineering to Release Quote Line','N/A') ))
CustomField.label: Actions Required
